::Hevn::

     He lowers his voice to a whisper.  "I don't know how he treated you.  I wasn't around that much.  But I know you loved each other very much.  I can only assume that he's coming for you, but there's really no way for me to know for sure."  He looks down at his feet.  "Blackstorm, there's one more thing you should know."
